author: CTPPS
body:
- removed plots (unused) depending on `CorrelationPlotsSelector` which consequently removes dependence on Qt, use of exit and printf.
- added `TotemRPDQMHarvester` module for calculating various histogram ratios
- `TotemRPDQMSource`
  - added few more plots
  - uses `getNumberOfClusters` from VFAT chips (following #14615)
- added config for online DQM: `DQM/Integration/python/clients/ctpps_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py`
- included Totem DQM modules to the offline DQM sequence: `DQMOffline/Configuration/python/DQMOffline_cff.py`

This PR functionally depends on #14605.
title: CTPPS: update of DQM for TOTEM RP
